content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal mine at position (x)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x1 to assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
